price: Ben, hanif olarak, yüzümü, gökleri ve yeri yaratan Allah’a yönelttim. Ben, asla müşriklerden değilim, demişti.
arabic: إِنِّي وَجَّهۡتُ وَجۡهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innī wajjahtu wajhiya lilladhī faṭara al-samāwāti wal-arḍa ḥanīfan wamā anā mina al-mush'rikīna
